definition: messy hair and dirty face/bad appearance
fleabane (family Asteraceae)/disheveled/classifier for luxuriant plants, smoke, ashes, campfires: clump, puff
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: This guy looked like a beaten-up spider-monkey mutant.
sentences.chinese: 这个家伙看起来活像个蓬头垢面的蜘蛛猴变种人。

sentences.english: The old beggar was dirty and unkempt.
Unkempt occasionally allowed, but must focus on occasion.
sentences.chinese: 允许偶尔蓬头垢面，但要注重场合。

sentences.english: Maybe you come to the office disheveled.
sentences.chinese: 假设你蓬头垢面地到办公室上班。

sentences.english: She was bedraggled when she came in out of the rain.
sentences.chinese: 她淋着雨回来使她显得蓬头垢面。

sentences.english: Who likes to see an unkempt room?
sentences.chinese: 谁喜欢看到一个蓬头垢面的空间呢？

sentences.english: But, if your friend roams about outside, dishevelled hair and dirty face.
sentences.chinese: 可是，如果说你的朋友在外流浪，蓬头垢面。

definition: with dishevelled hair (idiom)/with one's hair down
not care about one's appearance (idiom)/slovenly in dress and manner

lit. to present oneself confidently to the emperor, without makeup (as did the sister of Yang Guifei 楊貴妃|杨贵妃[Yang2 Gui4 fei1]) (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) to show one's natural features, without makeup/to present oneself just as one is, without artifice
lit. with disheveled hair and a dirty face/of unkempt appearance (idiom)
lit. clothes not covering the body (idiom)/fig. poverty-stricken
yellow face, emaciated body (idiom); malnourished and sickly in appearance
head and face filthy with grime (idiom)/covered in dirt/dejected and depressed
